vistra.framework.graph.item.state.command

Interface IItemStateCommand

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ICommand
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractItemStateCommand, BackEdgeCommand, CrossEdgeCommand, DiscardedEdgeCommand, DiscoveryEdgeCommand, ForwardEdgeCommand, InitializedVertexCommand, SolutionMemberEdgeCommand, SolutionMemberVertexCommand, UpdatedVertexCommand, VisitedVertexCommand

    public interface IItemStateCommand
extends ICommand
    An item-state command interface.

    The name of an item-state command derives from the item-state name.

    Author:
    Roland Bruggmann (brugr9@bfh.ch)

      • Methods inherited from interface vistra.framework.util.ICommand
